page.line: "Special thanks to everyone at Sega and
Creative Assembly for this masterpiece of authenticity,
gameplay and world building. Also special thanks to all
our colleagues at Games Workshop for building and
creating the Warhammer Fantasy Battles world."

line.right: Nathan - The Great Book of Grudges
